definition: to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to pack and quit/to be sacked
to pack one's things and leave

sentences.english: The world seemed very small - there was no place for me and my little roll of bedding.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得世界很小，没有安置我与我的小铺盖卷的地方。

sentences.english: Pacific Ocean waves smash the boulder-strewn coast of Iquique, Chile.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋海浪粉碎大石铺盖的海岸在智利的伊基克。

sentences.english: There is sufficient sand available to blanket the unconformity.
sentences.chinese: 这里有充足的砂质物铺盖不整合面。

sentences.english: One in three workers will be gone.
sentences.chinese: 三分之一的工人会卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: You may sleep on the deck or in the hold, as you prefer. Ysilla will find bedding for you.
sentences.chinese: 你睡在甲板还是货仓随你便，伊西拉会给你找点铺盖。

sentences.english: A hobo, especially one who carries a bedroll.
sentences.chinese: 流浪者，游民流浪汉，尤指带着铺盖卷。

sentences.english: If they didn't, they were going home.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有，就得卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: Determination of the line of saturation behind a inclined wall and the equipotential line below a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 确定斜墙后浸润线的位置及铺盖下等势线的分布。

sentences.english: She hath made for herself clothing of tapestry: fine linen, and purple is her covering.
sentences.chinese: 她为自己做华丽的铺盖，身穿的是细麻和紫锦的衣裳。

sentences.english: There is sufficient sand available to blanket the unconformity.
sentences.chinese: 这里有富足的砂质物铺盖不整合面。

sentences.english: All timber floors are covered with floor boarding, described later.
sentences.chinese: 所有的木楼面都用木板铺盖，详述于后。

sentences.english: Also like the yellow quilt, blanket in the fields, or water.
sentences.chinese: 又象黄色的棉被，铺盖在田地里，或者水面上。

sentences.english: So winter, with its pure white blanket of snow, has its own beauty.
sentences.chinese: 所以，铺盖着纯净白雪的冬天也有它自己独特的美。

sentences.english: If you are late tomorrow, then you will pack yourself off .
sentences.chinese: 如果明天你迟到的话，那么卷铺盖走人。

sentences.english: If you don't work well, you'd better pack up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不努力工作，最好还是卷铺盖走吧。

definition: kang (a heatable brick bed)/to bake/to dry by the heat of a fire
to make one's bed on the floor
